This is an excellent idea to put a 100% All-in-one-torrent BUT it's far too big (my Laptop has only 100GB!).
Besides, why couldn't we just upload all the episodes in a decent quality on youtube; using the same tags, information, etc.? That would be far more efficient instead of waiting a good month or longer to get the 33GB down...

I would reccommend getting a REAL BitTorrent client, such as Azures.  That way you can pick and choose the exact files you want to download.

I would also reccommend getting an external HD.

I personally prefer the ALL IN ONE torrents, that way I know I have the WHOLE series.  And I have no problems sorting the files into 8 gig groups to be burnt onto dual layer DVD's.
I have got it complete in two hours or so. will seed it for 2 weeks at least;-)
